---
title: Data Prep
---

-   Complete data entries

    -   Check that all relevant columns in the Deployment Details spreadsheet are completed

    -   Reach out to deployment/retrieval team for additional deployment details if needed

-   Extract SUD files using Soundtrap Host software

-   Generate full bandwidth LTSA

    -   On Triton 

    -   5s 200Hz resolution

-   Identify recording data start/end

    -   Using LTSA, truncate data (delete recordings outside of that time)

-   Update deployment details 

    -   Input recording start/end times and data quality

    -   Update Anne
